' Project: {projectName}
' Type: Simple Empty ZX Spectrum Template
' Generated by NextBuild Project Creator

'!org=$8000

' Leave out the nextlib, but lets include a macro for break 
' #include "nextlib.bas"

#define break\ 
    asm : db $fd, 00 : end asm 

#include <print42.bas>


' Variables go here 
dim     x as ubyte = 0
dim     y as ubyte = 0

' Initialise here 
MainInit()

' Main loop
do 

    ' Wait for raster line 192
    WaitRaster(192)

loop 

'----------------------------------------------------------
' Subroutines go here

sub MainInit()

    ' if using ULA disable layer 2 
    ShowLayer2(0)
    ' set USL order 
    NextReg(SPRITE_CONTROL_NR_15,%000_100_00)
    ' set border, paper, ink 
    border 1 : paper 1 : ink 6 : cls 

    ' print text 
    print42("Welcome to {projectName}!")

end sub
